channel.title: Help with weapon attack speed?
channel.description:
im trying to figure out how to change the speed of a weapon. ex: change a godsword to attack as fast as a scimitar. i think its in combatassistant.java but dont know what to do from there.
thx in advance

item.title: Help with weapon attack speed?
item.dc:creator: @GabbeIzABawz GabbeIzABawz.
item.description:
@GabbeIzABawz wrote:

search for that and you should find this:
[code]switch (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {[/code]
There you can set the weapon speeds, if your using PI.

search for that and you should find this:

There you can set the weapon speeds, if your using PI.
